hooks.command: [ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files on main branch. Create a feature branch first."}' >&2; exit 2; }

case "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" in *.py) uv run black "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" --line-length 100 --quiet 2>&1; uv run ruff check "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" --fix 2>&1; echo '{"feedback": "Formatted with black and ruff.", "suppressOutput": true}'; esac

case "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" in *test*.py) echo '{"feedback": "Running tests..."}' >&2; uv run pytest "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" -v 2>&1 | tail -20; exit_code=$?; if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then echo '{"feedback": "Tests passed."}'; else echo '{"feedback": "Tests failed. See output above."}' >&2; fi; esac
case "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" in *.py) uv run mypy "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 | head -10 || true; echo '{"feedback": "mypy check complete.", "suppressOutput": true}'; esac
